days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

O God, I adore You. I give myself to You. May I be the person You want me to be, and May Your will be done in my life today.  I thank You for the gifts You gave Father Solanus. If it is Your Will, bless us with the Canonization of Father Solanus so that others may imitate and carry on his love for all the poor and suffering of our world.  As he joyfully accepted Your divine plans, I ask You, according to Your Will, to hear my prayer for… (mention your request) through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen.  Blessed be God in all His Designs.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
